posts.post_title: FS - T206 Lajoie with Bat SGC 3
posts.post_content: Hi everyone - for sale is a well centered Nap Lajoie with Bat, SGC 3.  Asking [STRIKE]1K[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]950[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$925[/STRIKE] SOLD net to me, delivered.  Shipping Priority Mail to U.S. only.  Claim in the thread, PM with any questions.  Thanks for looking!
Nevermind...sorry, can't figure this out.  If you want larger pics, just PM me and I'll email them.  Thanks!
Price reduced again to $900, or also would consider a trade.  Looking for Dahlen Brooklyn or Matty White Cap, among others, but open to other pre-war stuff as well, so let me know what you got!
